title: Carlton vs. Fortnite: You Can’t Copyright That - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.15.19
description:
Start your trial month of Hims for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Tim and Greg catch you up on the Carlton Dance copyright, Apex Legends milestones, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:10 - Housekeeping
Don’t forget the Kinda Funny World Tour rolls on! This Sunday, we’re in San Francisco at Triple Voodoo Brewery at 3 p.m. Then, it’s Kansas City on March 30th and New York on April 6th. Get the full rundown on kindafunny.com/events.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock, TJ Meehan, Joebeezer, Trevor Starkey, Mohammed Mohammed, and Black Jack!
The Roper Report   -
00:04:32 - Alfonso Ribeiro Fails to Copyright the Carlton Dance
00:13:00 - ‘Bayonetta 2’ Director Leaves Platinum Games After 13 Years
00:16:20 - Apex Legends News
00:21:05 - Out today
00:31:52 -  Hims
Reader mail   -
00:33:32 - I am honestly surprised about the lack of buzz/hype surrounding the news that XBox is bringing XBox Live to the Nintendo Switch. - Dan Lima
00:30:32 - I was hoping we would see that sweet sweet Pikmin 3 nectar getting announced in the direct. - Ethan Hunt
00:43:38 - Why did Microsoft continue to fund the development of Crackdown 3, but not continue to fund Scalebound? - Black Jack
00:48:45 - With the ever dwindling relevance of E3, I wonder two things... - Malcontent Ronin
00:56:00 - Squad Up: Nathan - Xbox - Groat Simulator
00:57:25 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Greg and Adam Bankhurst
TUESDAY: Greg and Andrea
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Andrea
FRIDAY: Greg and Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games...

Producers: Kevin Coello, Joey Takegami, Barrett Courtney
Edited by: Greg Gettys


Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
